modName: Top Model Vanilla Armors Conversion Project
summary: This is the final conversion of all the skyrim vanilla outfits for Top Model BBP. TBBP or no physic.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5][b][center][size=5][b]- NO MORE UPDATES WILL BE RELEASED FOR NOW[/b][/size] -
IF ANYONE WOULD LIKE TO HELP ME CONTINUING THIS PROJECT, PLEASE LET ME KNOW![/center][center][/center]Many Thanks to:[/b][/size][/color]

[list][*][size=3][color=#ffff00][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7479893/?][color=#ffff00]es2[/color][/url][/b][/color] for [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?][color=#ffff00]Top Model[/color][/url][/b] body[/size]
[/*]
[*][color=#ffff00][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/927644/?][color=#ffff00][size=3]MrTroubleMaker[/size][/color][/url][/b][/color][size=3] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28099/?][color=#ffff00][b]Bikini Trouble[/b][/color][/url] textures and meshes[/size]
[/*]
[*][color=#ffff00][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2662231/?][color=#ffff00][size=3]ff13[/size][/color][/url][/b][/color][size=3] for some bikini textures[/size]
[/*]
[*][s][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5130874/?][color=#ffff00][b]Skysan4298[/b][/color][/url][color=#ffff00][b][/b][/color] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29123/?][color=#ffff00][b]Transparent and refracting Glass[/b][/color][/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53067][color=#ffff00][b]Refracting Stalhrim[/b][/color][/url][/size][size=3][b] [/b][/size][b][color=#ff0000][size=3](Future Update!)[/size][/color][/b][/s]
[/*]
[/list][b]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Required Mods (Install BEFORE this mod):[/size][/color]

[list][*][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?][color=#ffff00]Top Model Body[/color][/url][/size][/b][/*]
